subject: Golf
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa finished second in the L.P.G.A. Tour Championship to earn the top player title for the fourth year in a row. Anna Nordqvist won the tournament by two strokes.
snippet: Lorena Ochoa finished second in the L.P.G.A. Tour Championship to earn the top player title for the fourth year in a row. Anna Nordqvist won the tournament by two strokes.
